def_cn: 重新摄制的作品；翻拍的电影
def_en: A remake is a film that has the same story, and often the same title, as a film that was made earlier.
If a film is remade, a new film is made that has the same story, and often the same title, as a film that was made earlier.

def_cn: (尤指以更好的方式)重新做，改造，翻新
def_en: If you have something remade, you ask someone to make it again, especially in a way that is better than before.
